The Bead Bubble

Where Designs Come to Life

About the Club

The Bead Bubble is home to creative souls. We believe that anyone can make captivating jewellery they are proud of given the resources to do so. Whether you've just purchased your first round nose pliers or have recently perfected your magnum opus, we welcome you with open arms. We will be hosting show and tells and bringing in guest jewellers to run instruction sessions (supplies included!).

Our Mission

Our mission is to inspire, empower, and connect people through the art of jewellery making. Creativity should never be limited by cost or experience level, so all of our programs and events are completely free. We provide materials, tools, and expert guidance so that every member—beginner or expert—can learn, grow, and shine.

Membership Benefits

Guest Jeweller Instruction Sessions

Learn specialized techniques from professional artisans. All supplies, materials, and tools are provided free of charge.

Show & Tell Events

Share your latest creations, get feedback, and celebrate the work of others in a supportive atmosphere.

Community Connection

Membership in the Bead Bubble is your all-access pass to instruction, inspiration, and connection—and it's 100% free!

"The Bead Bubble is built on curiosity, community, and collaboration. We encourage experimentation, celebrate every milestone, and create a space where everyone feels comfortable expressing themselves."

The Bead Bubble Community

Join the Bead Bubble

At The Bead Bubble, every bead, wire, and gemstone is part of a bigger story—yours. No matter where you are on your creative journey, you'll find support, laughter, and inspiration waiting for you here. Join us, and let's create something extraordinary together.
